location: Deep city vault, then return to Jax's hiding spot Level 9

knows: The vault contains massive amounts of physical Earth currency
Multiple currencies: USD, Euro, Yuan, Pounds, Yen, Rubles, others
At least 80 boxes of preserved currency
Need to find a fence/buyer for high-value goods
Plan to sell test batch first
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Awed, hopeful, overwhelmed by possibilities, anxious about next steps
Jax Varro.physical_state: Exhausted from 12-hour round trip, shoulders and legs burning

knows: Same as Jax regarding the vault contents
This is dangerous - people will kill for this
Finn.emotional_state: Cautiously excited, practical, worried about Jax's dreams

revealed_to_reader: Contains ~80 boxes of preserved Earth currency
Multiple currencies from dead nations: USD, Euro, Yuan, GBP, Yen, Rubles
Both paper bills and metal coins
Physical currency has been extinct for 500 years
Someone collected and sealed this before the exodus or during early station history
Face value in millions, collector value potentially billions
Jax and Finn took 6 boxes as samples
They resealed the vault and obscured the entrance
Plan is to find fence, sell test batch, then return for more
Jax is thinking about using money to escape and 'live like an Alpha'
Finn knows that's not really Jax's nature

planted.element: Jax dreaming about escaping to upper levels
planted.significance: His dream that will be crushed when he learns he can't leave

planted.element: Finn's question 'what will you do if this works?'
planted.significance: Foreshadows the choice Jax will face

planted.element: Fear of being killed for the treasure

active_tensions: Danger of being discovered with the currency
Risk of being killed for the fortune
Hope versus reality of what money can actually buy
world_changes: Jax and Finn have retrieved 6 boxes of Earth currency
They know the location of approximately 74 more boxes
Vault is resealed and location obscured
